name: Collapse (itch)
description:
Please Note: itch.io  doesn't support highscores! Play the game on Scirra Arcade (https://www.scirra.com/arcade/puzzle-games/collapse-33787) to save your highscores!

Made for Ludum Dare 42. You are locked in a series of experiments, can you escape them?

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement [Double Jump is possible]
Spacebar - Change Arrow
R - Restart Level
